channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump returns to DC as dim outlook lingers, no end in sight for shutdown

item.description: Extending money to the South American nation is risky but could help spur reforms that would create a prosperous, powerful American ally.

item.description: U.S. beef prices have been stubbornly high for a variety of reasons.

item.title: The FDA Has A Chemical Abortion Pill Problem
item.description: If we want to Make America Healthy Again, we must reevaluate deadly chemical abortion pills, not approve even more of them.

item.title: As DEI Dies, Corporate America Faces Serious Risk
item.description: If a corporate DEI plan reads like a quota, then expect a subpoena.

item.title: Why You’re A Bad Parent If You Don’t Spank Your Kids
item.description: Critics of spanking make arguments based on the wrong foundation: they judge punishment by results rather than by its role in justice.

item.title: Criminal Illegal Alien Who Ran Des Moines Schools Registered As Maryland Voter
item.description: The left clings to corruptible voting systems in a process where having a path to cheat is just as bad as actually cheating.
